subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Volleyball
lead_paragraph: Jenny Lang Ping, who won Olympic gold on the Chinese volleyball team and now coaches the U.S. team, is an example of how the global marketplace continues to blur old barricades.
snippet: Jenny Lang Ping, who won Olympic gold on the Chinese volleyball team and now coaches the U.S. team, is an example of how the global marketplace continues to blur old barricades.
